General.Name: Vercom SA
General.Description: Vercom S.A. develops cloud communications platforms. Its platforms enable companies to build and develop relationships with recipients through various channels, such as email, SMS, push, and instant messaging. Vercom S.A. was founded in 2005 and is based in Poznan, Poland. Vercom S.A. is a subsidiary of R22 S.A.
